ygData.subject: Re: traveling
ygData.msgSnippet: You should be able to score the halberd on your own with a good group. Hagrick Shralok isn t that tough...just bring a melee partner and a mage or two.  On
ygData.messageBody:
You should be able to score the halberd on your own with a good group.

Hagrick Shralok isn't that tough...just bring a melee partner and a mage or
two. On Bertox we have a particular mage who has been camping and
kill-stealing the halby for 2 weeks, so it is a bit tougher.

All in all it should work out well tho. You let your group keep all the
loot, you get the halby. Lots or ringmail, bronze weapons and other good
loot.




-----Original Message-----
From: mark mark <markerob@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 3:30 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] traveling


>From: mark mark <markerob@...>
>
>if the shield isn't magical I can't use it, but thanks for the offer.
Really
>I am looking for a bronze plate halmet or a magical two handed weapon, if
>anyone knows where a lev almost 18 warrior can get one please send me a
>message. I have been fighting for a week now, but it is hard to build up
>150 plat for the halbered, also hard to find anyone selling it.
>
>Arathorne, solsek ro
>
>
